Posts.Content: ssr super quinone (aka methylglyoxal). blue green algae alkaline water(for ph balance). Noni juice and or alovera juice. My aunt is on all these and she is going great, from stage 4 cancer. the ssr super quinone is very expensive... but when it came down to her life its worth it. about my aunt she had to stop her chemo because it was too much for her. Now we took things in our own hands and she is donig well. they gave her only 3 days to live and its been 5 weeks. but the most important things are prayer and faith.
Posts.Title: Suggestions Greatly Appreciated...
